features: Make it easy - and fun - for your child to stay in touch with friends and family with this seal and send stationery pack
Large 10.5" x 7.75" spiral bound, stationery pad includes 40 full-color sheets that are lined on one side and ready for writing
After writing a note, fold it and seal it with one of the included stickers
The perfect way to write a thank you note to a friend or tell grandma about summer camp
A colorful and fun way for your child to keep everyone only a mailbox away!
body.description: Make it easy - and fun - for your child to stay in touch with friends and family with this seal and send stationery pack! Spiral bound book includes 40 full-color sheets that are lined on one side and ready for writing. After writing a note, fold it and seal it with one of the included stickers. Now its ready to send! It's the perfect way to write a thank you note to a friend or tell grandma about summer camp!At iscream we are obsessed about fun, function and style - see our whole line for new ideas and old favorites with a new twist!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great stationery, great deal!
reviews.reviewText: I paid full price for this item, and I'll definitely buy more.I got the "I Love You S'More" pattern. It's really cute, and the colors are true to the product page. The book contains 40 tri-fold sheets and 48 stickers. In case you haven't see this type of thing before, you tear a page from the book, write your letter, fold the paper into roughly thirds along a pre-made crease, and it closes with a sticker. There is a perforation along the top for removing the scrappy end from the spiral. It's hard to see, and younger kids won't be able to remove it, or won't be bothered.I've had a lot of these over the years, both my own as a camper, and then for my kids. This stationery has none of the usual problems.The lines are wide enough for younger kids to write on easily.There's plenty of space to write (my son's stationery has about five lines, which, to be honest, is five lines more than he uses).There aren't pictures covering the writing area, so you can actually read what was written.The sticker is sticky, and actually keeps the trifold closed.There are a LOT of sheets. They typical set has about eight pieces, and costs more than this giant pad. This might last my 9 year old through the rest of her summers at sleepaway camp.NOTE: It takes a standard stamp, the same one you'd use to mail an envelope.I have no complaints about this product. It's a great deal, and I'll certainly buy more for my daughter and my nieces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very nice, just as shown in picture
reviews.reviewText: this product was just as described in the photo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2017
reviews.reviewText: My 10 year old too it to sleepaway camp and used it to write letters everyday. The letter paper made it easy for her to write and seal. Very cute, fun letter paper that she enjoyed using and it encouraged her to write. I'll surely but it again for next year's camp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2016
reviews.reviewText: This stationary was purchased by me for camp letters to my children. Both my son and daughter wanted to keep the stationary as there own but I said it was mine and I purchased the same type of stationary for them with different designs. The stationary is super easy use, just write, fold and place the sticker on to close, no envelope needed. The quality is excellent and the stickers are super cute; marshmallows, hearts, smores...You can write on several pieces, fold as one letter and use one sticker. I actually put a sticker on the side just in case but I think it would have been fine had I not.Would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy way to stay in touch with friends
reviews.reviewText: Adequate space to write a message to my friends and family. No need to hunt for an envelope, just write and send it off. Makes me happy and gives my friends and family, I believe, a treat to hear from me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Really cute but there's no "seal." You'd have to completely line 3 sides w/the included stickers to make any kind of seal and there aren't enough stickers to do that for every sheet included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Great way for kids to write home from camp!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Easy to tear off. Perfect for sleepaway camp.
